definitions.definition: A process of putting a person's name and address on an item of mail
Any of several methods of locating and accessing information within storage
A mode, manner, or form of direct speech to an audience.

main_definition: A process of putting a person's name and address on an item of mail
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) Any of several methods of locating and accessing information within storage
( linguistics ) A mode, manner, or form of direct speech to an audience.
